dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I got told to take a seat by the window. It was quite nice and cool outside, so there was a perfect breeze to match with the warmth of the sun.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: My eyes turned to the grounds of the school, and much to my surprise I caught sight of a strange girl with an eyepatch doing some weird poses to somebody else.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I didn’t want a crazy life and I especially didn’t want to have to deal with somebody as ridiculous as that.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Hanging out with that kind of person is a prime way to get seen as a weirdo by everybody else and nobody likes a weirdo.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Today's classes were uneventful for the most part. It was all introductory stuff that I could barely stay awake for, but every once in a while I would notice something strange out of the window.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: There was a student who was quite small, with grey skin and massive eyes, probably some kind of costume and some pretty-boy riding a horse...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Is there some kind of horse-riding club I don't know about?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Then I made my way home...
